root.TEXT:
Record date: 2077-11-10
Reason for Visit
follow up
First visit in over 5 months. Had injury at work, fell and rx right shoulder- had surgery and now will have to have shoulder replacement by Dr. Denny. Went through rehab and has been living with her son in Washington- her apartment is being fixed up but likely she will move because of issues with elevator- lookiing for elderly housing. No pain issues, still has constipation- takes senna and colace bid. Is concerned about addictive personality- off narcotics but is attending NA meetings and wants to get of amitriptyline and trazodone-would like to try neurontin.
BS are good- on 18 units insulin bid and has been trying to lose wt- 1+ /week.
Will have EMG on 11/26 because of numbness right hand and concern about brachial nerve. Will also have CT. She has tingling left medial fingers - advised EMG of that hand too. Needs BMD- needs to get clearance from workers comp.
Generally doing well. Using Chantix. Reviewed meds. Needs new rx.
BS 117-121, no hypoglycemai
Medications Text
verapamil 120 mg bid
novolog 70/30 18units bid
amitriptylin 50/25- will stop
lisinopril 10mg qd--BPs have been high
MVI
ASA 325 mg qd
simvastain 20mg qd
vit c 1000mg qd
metoprolol 100mg qd
lasix 20mg- no longer taking
chantix
Allergies
NKA
Past Medical History
OB:G1 P1
UCHD, no ARF
Family History
non contributory
children-one son, Hep C
no FH of colon cancer, breast cancer
Social History
smoking: up to 1.5 ppd on weekends
EtOH: rare
drugs: MJ--thinking about stopping because it causes increase in appetite
substance abuse: none
OTC meds: none

work: Appraiser-currently unemployed

Review of Systems
General: wt lost 11.5 lbs since May
Eye : reg ck-done this yr
ENT: no sinus sx,
skin: no rashes
esp: no cough, SOB, sputum, hemoptysis
CV: no CP, palpitations, edema, orthopnea, PND
GI: no nausea, vomiting, heartburn, diarrhea, constipation, melena, hematochezia
breast: mammogram --needs
GU: no dysuria, hematuria.
LMP: late 40s
contraception: NA
MS: no arthritis or joint pain
neuro: no dizziness, syncope
MH: no depression
All other systems were reviewed and are negative
Vital Signs
BLOOD PRESSURE 146/76
PULSE 78
WEIGHT 210 lb
Physical Exam
looks well. does not smell of smoke
wt dec 11.5 lbs
BP 138/80 left arm large cuff by me
lungs clear
heart S1S2 no murmur
no edema
Assessment
1. HBP - cont current meds- doing well
2. smoking- onChantix
3. right shoulder fx
4. HPV-??
5. DM-HBA1C 6.1- doing well
6. HM: needseye ck, mammogra
7. CRF-creat stable
8. ? CTS
9. PN- will stop amitriptyline and start on gabapentin 100mg bid--> 300mg bid
Orders
E&M Level
99214 Level 4, Outpatient Visit, Established Patient
In-Office Procedures
90471 IMADM PRQ ID SUBQ/IM NJXS 1 VACC
90658 Flu vaccine, split, 3 yrs & >
Diagnosis
V04.81 Need for prophylactic vaccination and inoculation against influenza
250.60 Diabetes mellitus with neurological manifestations, type II or unspecified type, not stated as uncontrolled
250.00 Diabetes mellitus without mention of complication, type II or unspecified type, not stated as uncontrolled
401.9 Unspecified essential hypertension
Plan
1. Medications reviewed and reconciled
2. needs left EMG
3. RTO 1 mon
4. new rx written
5. bowel regimen discussed.
